list.title: Deezer#api
list.description: Does a request to the Deezer API.

list.title: Deezer#get
list.description: Gets an entity by ID or URL.

list.title: Deezer#getAndDecryptTrack
list.description: Gets a track buffer and decrypts it. By default, the track is in MP3.

list.title: Entity
list.description: An object with entity type, info, and resolved tracks
